survey_brief: This survey aims to understand customer preferences and behaviors related to online grocery shopping to enhance service offerings.

questions.question_text: How often do you shop for groceries online?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure the option 'Never' routes respondents to a different set of questions about in-store shopping if applicable.

script.question_text: How often do you shop for groceries online?

questions.question_text: Which of the following factors are most important to you when choosing an online grocery service? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Shown if Q1 answer is not 'Never'
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format. Consider randomizing the order of options to avoid bias.

script.question_text: Which of the following factors are most important to you when choosing an online grocery service? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Shown if Q1 answer is not 'Never'

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your preferred online grocery service?
questions.routing_logic: Shown if Q1 answer is not 'Never'
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your preferred online grocery service?
script.routing_logic: Shown if Q1 answer is not 'Never'

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the delivery reliability of your current online grocery service? (1 = Very dissatisfied, 5 = Very satisfied)
questions.routing_logic: Shown if Q1 answer is not 'Never'
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for single-choice responses. Ensure the scale is clearly labeled for accessibility.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the delivery reliability of your current online grocery service? (1 = Very dissatisfied, 5 = Very satisfied)
script.routing_logic: Shown if Q1 answer is not 'Never'
